page.description: Returns .t. if the binary objects are the same length and values.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = BLOBEQUAL(B Blob1, B Blob2)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Both blob variables contain the same data and have the same lengths. .F. = The blob variables are different with respect to contents and/or length.

page.discussion: The BlobEqual() function returns TRUE (.T.) if two blob variables have the same content and are the same length.
